messages.body:
Dear Wanky


This may be of interest. We 
often have need of suitable cleaning material for the contract we have with the
Royal Household, where standards are high. However we would need assurance that
your products would not shrink, fade or otherwise degenerate the fabrics we
have 
to deal with. 


I attach two some images of the range of material we have to work 
with, especially with the Prince of Wales and Duchess of Cornwall. In 
particular we have problems with claret stains and frequent horse sweating on 
bottoms.


Regards
TOSSOV 
Lonslo Tossov 
Cack & 
Chavster Tailors 
69 Kustardt Levy 
Muggins 
Smegaroonshire 
UR1 
PRAT 


Tel/fax  44 (0)906 xxx xxxx
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

To: wancy@jinlism.com

Dear Wanky

This may be of interest. We often have need of suitable cleaning material for the contract we have with the Royal Household, where standards are high. However we would need assurance that your products would not shrink, fade or otherwise degenerate the fabrics we have to deal with.

I attach two some images of the range of material we have to work with, especially with the Prince of Wales and Duchess of Cornwall. In particular we have problems with claret stains and frequent horse sweating on bottoms.

Regards
TOSSOV
Lonslo Tossov
Cack & Chavster Tailors
69 Kustardt Levy
Muggins
Smegaroonshire
UR1
PRAT

Tel/fax 44 (0)906 xxx xxxx

messages.body:
Dear Tossov 
,


Thank you for your 
reply. I know you request high standard of the 
goods, please rest assured the quality of our products. 
We manufacture Detergent 
Raw Materials for many years, has good reputation in this industry.


Would you please tell 
me which items do you need, LABSA, SLES or STPP ? I attached three images 
of  the  items's specification at the request of  high 
standard.


We looking forward for your early 
reply.


Best 
Regards
Wancy
 


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

Dear Tossov ,

Thank you for your reply. I know you request high standard of the goods, please rest assured the quality of our products. We manufacture Detergent Raw Materials for many years, has good reputation in this industry.

Would you please tell me which items do you need, LABSA, SLES or STPP ? I attached three images of the items's specification at the request of high standard.

We looking forward for your early reply.

Best
Regards
Wancy

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wancy 


We are considering which might be best. Which can best be recommended for 
Harris Tweed plus fours, especially those with grass stains in the posteriors 
and knees? Also what is the estimated time of shipping to the UK?
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

Dear Mr Wancy

We are considering which might be best. Which can best be recommended for Harris Tweed plus fours, especially those with grass stains in the posteriors and knees? Also what is the estimated time of shipping to the UK?

messages.body:
Dear Tossov 
,


Thank you for your 
reply. 


We recommend SLES for you, but It 
is determined by  your technical personnel. We are pleased to 
offer you a favorable price when you decide which product you will buy. We 
will deliver goods  after receive  your deposit within 
10-15 days.  And the voyage time is 35 days.


We will appreciated 
for your timely reply.


Best Regards


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

A week later:

Dear Tossov ,

Thank you for your reply.

We recommend SLES for you, but It is determined by your technical personnel. We are pleased to offer you a favorable price when you decide which product you will buy. We will deliver goods after receive your deposit within 10-15 days. And the voyage time is 35 days.

We will appreciated for your timely reply.

Best Regards

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wanky


How can you deliver goods within 10-15 
days if the voyage takes 35? 


Also what news about the Plus Fours 
staining problem. It can be a real issue at the Palace after Wentworth. HRH
went 
through 8 pairs last season in a week 
alone.
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

A week after that:

Dear Mr Wanky

How can you deliver goods within 10-15 days if the voyage takes 35?

Also what news about the Plus Fours staining problem. It can be a real issue at the Palace after Wentworth. HRH went through 8 pairs last season in a week alone.

messages.body:
Dear Tossov 
,


I mean we need 
10-15 days to prepare the goods, and it takes 35 days to deliver the goods to 
destination port.


I know you need to 
solve the staining problem. you can place an small trial order of 20 
tons first. 
We believe that our product decontamination ability is very good. 
 If our product can solve your staining problem, 
We can continue our cooperation.


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

A few days later:

Dear Tossov ,

I mean we need 10-15 days to prepare the goods, and it takes 35 days to deliver the goods to destination port.

I know you need to solve the staining problem. you can place an small trial order of 20 tons first. We believe that our product decontamination ability is very good. If our product can solve your staining problem, We can continue our cooperation.

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wanky


Thank you for your prompt reply. I must say 
that 20 tons seems an awful lot for the amount of gentlemanly and sporting 
stains we have constantly to work on here. This is garmentry from the royal 
party after all, not the sheets from a knocking shop. Is there any less
quantity 
that can be supplied in the first instance? 


Lonslo 
Tossov 
Cack & Chavster Tailors
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

A few days later:

Dear Mr Wanky

Thank you for your prompt reply. I must say that 20 tons seems an awful lot for the amount of gentlemanly and sporting stains we have constantly to work on here. This is garmentry from the royal party after all, not the sheets from a knocking shop. Is there any less quantity that can be supplied in the first instance?

Lonslo Tossov
Cack & Chavster Tailors

messages.body:
Dear Tossov 
,
Do you receive my 
email, could you kindly tell me if you can accept the quantity of 5 tons?
Hope your early 
reply, thank you.


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

A week later:

Dear Tossov , Do you receive my email, could you kindly tell me if you can accept the quantity of 5 tons? Hope your early reply, thank you.

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wanky


I must admit to some 
hesitation. 5 tons seems a lot in the circumstances. We would have to store it 
in the stables along Horse Guard Parade. How many plus fours would be cleaned
of 
difficult stains with that amount of powder? Normally Mrs Kwims here just adds
a 
couple shakes of Persil and put the pants on hot wash. Also would the product 
make the colour run, or create any chafing for the royal 
engagements?


Lonslo
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

Gets back to Wancy after several weeks:

Dear Mr Wanky

I must admit to some hesitation. 5 tons seems a lot in the circumstances. We would have to store it in the stables along Horse Guard Parade. How many plus fours would be cleaned of difficult stains with that amount of powder? Normally Mrs Kwims here just adds a couple shakes of Persil and put the pants on hot wash. Also would the product make the colour run, or create any chafing for the royal engagements?

Lonslo

messages.body:
Dear Lonslo,


In this case, can you 
tell me how many  would you like to order? How many product is 
suitable for you? 
As to how many 
difficult stains can be cleaned with that amount of powder , it is 
determined by your  finished product, what I only can guarantee 
is the quality of  SLES.
Hope your timely 
reply, thank you.


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

Next day!

Dear Lonslo,

In this case, can you tell me how many would you like to order? How many product is suitable for you? As to how many difficult stains can be cleaned with that amount of powder , it is determined by your finished product, what I only can guarantee is the quality of SLES. Hope your timely reply, thank you.

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wanky


We seem to have a lot of stains to deal 
with here at the moment, how soon did you say you can get some powders to us? 
HRH was around again showing his grass smears and I hate to give him the brush 
off for obvious reasons.


Having looked again at the condition of 
the laundry room in the basement with quite a back log, I think we'd 
be looking at a container 
load.
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

11 days later:

Dear Mr Wanky

We seem to have a lot of stains to deal with here at the moment, how soon did you say you can get some powders to us? HRH was around again showing his grass smears and I hate to give him the brush off for obvious reasons.

Having looked again at the condition of the laundry room in the basement with quite a back log, I think we'd be looking at a container load.

messages.body:
Dear Lonslo,


About four working 
days we can send some samples to you, but you need to pay the 
postage. Maybe our products can solve your problem. When you 
place the order, we will return the postage back to you. 


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

Next day!

Dear Lonslo,

About four working days we can send some samples to you, but you need to pay the postage. Maybe our products can solve your problem. When you place the order, we will return the postage back to you.

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wancy


Just a further thought: does SLES come in a 
range of scents? I know they are partial to parma violet, rosemary, and evening
hankypanky at the palace.  We would not want clothes to come out stinking 
like a stale pot noodle after all. Sorry to be particular, but we must be sure 
of our suppliers.
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

A week goes by before Lonslo answers:

Dear Mr Wancy

Just a further thought: does SLES come in a range of scents? I know they are partial to parma violet, rosemary, and evening hankypanky at the palace. We would not want clothes to come out stinking like a stale pot noodle after all. Sorry to be particular, but we must be sure of our suppliers.

messages.body:

Our products never 
have this case you worried. You will be assured of our products after sampling.
We believe the high 
quality of our product.


Wancy

Wancy

Now Wancy waits a week to reply.

Our products never have this case you worried. You will be assured of our products after sampling. We believe the high quality of our product.

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wancy


We have just had a huge pile of 
athletics gear in from the Olympics, full of track and field stains. Under our 
contract with the Games authorities we need a quick turnaround and no fading of
corporate logos. How soon can we get things moving? I am up to my armpits 
here in soiled spandex and tainted 
Speedos.


Lonslo
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

Dear Mr Wancy

We have just had a huge pile of athletics gear in from the Olympics, full of track and field stains. Under our contract with the Games authorities we need a quick turnaround and no fading of corporate logos. How soon can we get things moving? I am up to my armpits here in soiled spandex and tainted Speedos.

Lonslo

messages.body:
Dear Lonslo,


I have to emphasize  
the high quality of our products. If you worry the quality, we can send samples
to you, it need about 4 days. If you trust the high quality of our product, you
can considering a small trial order, one ton or several tons. It need about 
20 days. We can continue our cooperation when our product solve 
your problem. If you are not satisfied with our product,  we 
can looking forward to cooperate in the 
future.  


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

Dear Lonslo,

I have to emphasize the high quality of our products. If you worry the quality, we can send samples to you, it need about 4 days. We can continue our cooperation when our product solve your problem. If you are not satisfied with our product, we can looking forward to cooperate in the future.

Wancy

Yes please send me those samples, that 
would be very useful. How will they be sent? Will I have to arrange collection 
from the docks?


One or two tons might be enough, there is room in 
the coal cellar, move over the squatters 
some.


Regards


Lonslo T


Lonslo 
Tossov 
Cack & Chavster Tailors

messages.body:
Dear Mr Wanky


Perhaps you are right, also the freight 
connections to Smegaroon can sometimes be a little doubtful.  Are you able 
to ship to Yusaplonka? I think that would work out 
alright.
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

Perhaps you are right, also the freight connections to Smegaroon can sometimes be a little doubtful. Are you able to ship to Yusaplonka? I think that would work out alright.

Wancy

messages.body:

wardrobe?


Lonslo

messages.body:
Dear Lonslo,


Which country are you 
from, Britain or where does not exist-Narnia? I think you should 
be a wild beast or dwarf or a person looked like sheep and horse in Narnia. 
Perhaps you are not from  Narnia, you are from Hogwarts School 
of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Are you Voldemort? no, may 
be you are Wormtail.   


Wancy

Wancy

messages.body:
Dear Lonslo,
I know about 100 
ports in your country, but threre is no Yusaplonka. The shipping company could 
not arrive there.   If you can tell me a bigger port which most people 
know about it, I believe that the shipping company can reach 
there.


Wancy
messages.raw:
Wancy

Has he not given up?

messages.body:
If you really can't find our preferred port, then can you make
the delivery to Wattawanka? I am sure at least you must recognise that name. We
really can't wait much longer, and feel we are just been jerked around.  Lonslo


 Lonslo Tossov 
Cack & Chavster Tailors
